thread.section_title: The Beaumont - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of The Beaumont, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: carrjohn595
title: Excellent
text:
I can't say enough about excellence of this hotel.
I usually don't write reviews of hotels because if you are paying for five star hotel you know you are getting everything but here they have delivered the service that I never had in my life.
Staff is alwys smiling great small treats, things that just make you feel comfortable.
Located in Heart of the city but yet quiet, decoration above avereage.
